pages.title: Intro to Technomancy
pages.text: Most <thing>Technomancy/$ machines produce <thing>Temporal Entropy/$ instead of using power. <thing>Temporal Entropy/$ is a <em>reverse power system/$- instead of generators making power and machines using it, machines make <thing>Temporal Entropy/$ and 'generators' destroy it. If anything fills with <thing>Temporal Entropy/$, the machine will explode

with disastrous effects. <em>DO NOT LET ANYTHING FILL WITH <thing>TEMPORAL ENTROPY!/$$(br2)<thing>Temporal Entropy/$ can be easily destroyed in an <item>$(l:crossroads:technomancy/sink)Entropy Sink/$, which requires being placed over a beacon. <thing>Temporal Entropy/$ can be transmitted using <item>$(l:crossroads:technomancy/node)Entropy Nodes/$.$(br2)Most <thing>Technomancy/$ machines and items require a material called

<item>$(l:crossroads:technomancy/copshowium)Copshowium/$ to craft. It's worth getting a decent supply before starting.$(br2)A good first <thing>Technomancy/$ machine is the <item>$(l:crossroads:technomancy/beacon_harness)Beacon Harness/$, which produces massive amounts of <thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/beam)beams/$ cheaply.$(br2)
